Vulnerability.Description: The binary delta decoder in Mercurial before 3.7.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a (1) clone, (2) push, or (3) pull command, related to (a) a list sizing rounding error and (b) short records.
Vulnerability.Name: CVE-2016-3630

Vulnerability.Description: Mercurial before 3.7.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted name when converting a Git repository.
Vulnerability.Name: CVE-2016-3069

Vulnerability.Description: The convert extension in Mercurial before 3.8 might allow context-dependent attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted git repository name.
Vulnerability.Name: CVE-2016-3105
